mapper.sql: select stk.id, stk.qty, stk.material_id, stk.warehouse_id, stk.unit_price,stk.amt, stk.batch_no, stk.batch_id, stk.material_no, stk.material_date, stk.warehouse_date, stk.supplier_id,stk.begin_time,stk.end_time,stk.receipt_order_no,stk.kc_no, w.id wId,w.code warehouseCode,w.name warehouseName, m.id mId,m.code materialCode,m.name materialName, s.id sId,s.code supplierCode,s.name supplierName from stk_inventory stk left join fd_warehouse w on stk.warehouse_id = w.id left join fd_supplier s on stk.supplier_id = s.id left join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id

select SUM(IFNULL(stk.qty,0)) totalQty,SUM(IFNULL(stk.qty,0) * IFNULL(stk.unit_price,0)) totalAmt from stk_inventory stk left join fd_warehouse w on stk.warehouse_id = w.id left join fd_supplier s on stk.supplier_id = s.id left join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id
select stk.id,stk.material_id, m.id mId,m.code materialCode,m.name materialName from stk_inventory stk left join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id
mapper.select: select stk.id, stk.qty, stk.material_id, stk.warehouse_id, COALESCE(stk.unit_price, (select COALESCE(entry.unit_price, entry.price) from stk_io_bill_entry entry inner join stk_io_bill bill on bill.id = entry.paren_id where bill.bill_no = stk.receipt_order_no and bill.bill_type = 101 and entry.material_id = stk.material_id and entry.batch_no = stk.batch_no and entry.del_flag != 1 limit 1 ), CASE WHEN stk.amt IS NOT NULL AND stk.qty IS NOT NULL AND stk.qty > 0 THEN stk.amt / stk.qty ELSE NULL END ) as unit_price, stk.amt, stk.batch_no, stk.material_no, stk.material_date, stk.warehouse_date, stk.supplier_id,stk.begin_time,stk.end_time,stk.receipt_order_no, w.id wId,w.code warehouseCode,w.name warehouseName, m.id mId,m.code materialCode,m.name materialName, m.speci m_speci, m.model m_model, m.register_no m_registerNo, m.unit_id m_unitId, m.factory_id m_factoryId, m.supplier_id m_supplierId, u.unit_id u_id, u.unit_code u_code, u.unit_name u_name, f.factory_id f_id, f.factory_code f_code, f.factory_name f_name, ms.id ms_id, ms.code ms_code, ms.name ms_name, s.id sId,s.code supplierCode,s.name supplierName from stk_inventory stk left join fd_warehouse w on stk.warehouse_id = w.id left join fd_supplier s on stk.supplier_id = s.id inner join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id left join fd_unit u on m.unit_id = u.unit_id left join fd_factory f on m.factory_id = f.factory_id left join fd_supplier ms on m.supplier_id = ms.id where m.del_flag != 1 and m.is_gz != 1 and stk.qty > 0 and stk.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} order by stk.material_id, stk.batch_no, stk.id
